attributes.action: stop giving council houses to immigrants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: stop giving council houses to immigrants when there is so many british people on neverending waiting lists for property that fits their needs and can you make sure that any new council properties are built with a driveway to end roadway parking.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
